net.blackhacker.crypto

Class Crypto

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.blackhacker.crypto.Crypto
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Decryptor, Encryptor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PK, SK

    public abstract class Crypto
extends Object
implements Encryptor, Decryptor
    Abstract base class for both symmetric and asymmetric encryption algorithms
    Author:
    Benjamin King aka Blackhacker(bh@blackhacker.net)
